name: showNotification
desc: It’s always good practice to let users know when certain things have happened, be it a success message or a warning.

propSpec.desc: The id of the notifications component by which the notification should be rendered
The type of notification to show. Options are success, info, warning and error
When set to true, the notification will be shown in the user’s operating system instead of inside the browser
The message that should be shown
When autoClose is true, this is how long (in milliseconds) it will take for the message to vanish
